stimulusHtml: Which of the following gives the length of the curve  y = x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3C56@  over the closed interval [1,4] ?
choicesHtml: ∫ 1 4 1 + 1 2 x d x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@43C7@

∫ 1 4 1 + 1 2 x d x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4398@

∫ 1 4 1 − 1 4 x d x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@43A5@

∫ 1 4 1 + 1 4 x d x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@439A@

∫ 1 4 1 + 1 4 x 2 d x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4497@
